title: SoundBunny v1.0.2 – Tailor volume settings for individual applications
content: SoundBunny is a simple, powerful Mac volume control application that allows you to control the volume level for all open applications on your Mac. You can set the volume high for a movie or game you’re playing, while setting the volume low for your Mail alerts or notifications.   Easy Setup SoundBunny is incredibly easy […]

title: Window Magician v1.0.6 – Automatic window re-sizer and re-positioner
content: Window Magician helps streamline your user experience and optimize your workflow by automatically resizing and repositioning windows. Create “Window Watchers” to individually process windows with specific titles, from specific applications, and of specific types. Ensure all of your Finder windows are positioned tightly in the most top-left corner of the screen. Ensure your Web browser […]

title: Swift Share v2.0.6 – Easily create file share points across your local network
content: Swift Share allows users to easily create file share points across your local network. Sharing files across your local network just got easier! Swift Share allows the easy creation of both Windows and Mac share points. Take control of Mac OS X’s built-in file servers and tweak them to perfection. Share points are points across the […]

title: Lock ‘n’ Load 1.1 – Mac Action Game

title: Galaxy On Fire 2 Full HD + DLC 1.0.6 – Interstellar adventure game
content: With the recent release of Galaxy on Fire 2 Full HD, Fishlabs Entertainment’s award-winning sci-fi saga finally blazes onto your Windows PC. title: I’m Away v1.2 – Change all your IM statuses with one click
content: I’m Away is a simple utility that helps you change your statuses in the most popular Instant Messengers on Mac with one click only. Change your status in Skype, iChat, and Adium with one hotkey you choose yourself. Features: Changes statuses simultaneously; Compatible with iChat, Skype and Adium; Supports customizable hotkeys. title: Osfoora for Twitter 1.3 – Clean and intuitive Twitter client
content: Osfoora for Twitter is a powerful Twitter client with a clean and intuitive user interface. title: Sticky Notifications v1.0.4 – Sticky notes that integrate with notification center or Growl
content: Sticky Notifications … Sometimes you need to step away from your Mac for a moment (or to quickly deal with another task), and it can be handy to leave yourself a quick reminder of what you were doing.
